name: Were Car
description:
The year is 1985. It is the future.

JOHN RADD was a beat cop in Dungeon City until one night when he was bit by an enraged mechanic. Now every night he takes to the streets as WERECAR.

Criminal scum beware. You can't outrun a car.

NOTE TO MAC USERS: The game is playable, but graphically broken. Expect many a glitch. You have been warned!
